title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 16 Bitcoin Suisse cryptocurrency notes up for auction:3x 2013 non-denominated, out of 15001x 2019 XCHF non-denominated, 1st edition, out of 4994x 2019 BTC non-denominated, 1st edition, out of 31314x 2019 ETH non-denominated, 1st edition, out of 18462x 2019 BCH non-denominated, 1st edition, out of 1142x 2019 BSV non-denominated, 1st edition, out of 149STARTING BID: 0.2500BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 11th, 2022, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: NFTangerine
comments.body: Minerjones thanks a million for putting up the auction!

comments.author: pinky1234
comments.created_time: December 09, 2022, 03:48:34 PMLast edit: December 09, 2022, 04:03:04 PM by pinky1234
comments.body: why not split bill so we can bits on each bill lot ..

comments.body: Quote from: pinky1234 on December 09, 2022, 03:48:34 PMwhy not split bill so we can bits on each bill lot ..That may be considered if there are no bidders

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Ended with no biddersWill repost with smaller lots
